snippet: A group of powerful local businessmen led by George E. Norcross III bought the Philadelphia Media Network, which includes The Inquirer, The Daily News and Philly.com.
abstract: A group of powerful local businessmen led by George E. Norcross III bought the Philadelphia Media Network, which includes The Inquirer, The Daily News and Philly.com.

headline.main: Sale of Philadelphia Papers Is Completed
headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Group Buys Inquirer and Daily News
